about.me: Operated by a professional team of engineers with extensive experience designing, implementing, and delivering complex distributed systems.
about.server: Cloud hosted on Amazon Web Services. Deployed across three availability zones. Architected for high-availability, zero downtime, and maximum performance.
about.company: Sandstone is a professional Stake Pool running on the Cardano blockchain. We offer secure staking with a high-level of assurance that our servers remain online and minting blocks at all times.
